briefdescription.para: Pointer on function used to get remote CAN bus state.

detaileddescription.para:
This flag is used in case of reset of builtinlist DID 04a3 list.
values The elements is updated ErrSetBuiltInListRebuild, ErrResetBuiltInListRebuild unit N/A resolution N/A context task, ErrGetBuiltInListRebuild protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

This flag is used to in case of reset of built 061a list.
values The elements is updated ErrSetDK2BuiltInListRebuild, ErrResetDK2BuiltInListRebuild unit N/A resolution N/A context task, ErrGetDK2BuiltInListRebuild protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

memberdef.name: MapUint8ToTBilLinNodeIdx
memberdef.initializer: = { BIL_LIN1_BDM_IDX, BIL_LIN1_DCAC_IDX, BIL_LIN2_MFL_IDX, BIL_LIN2_KLR_IDX, BIL_LIN3_SHL_LI1_IDX, BIL_LIN3_SHL_LI2_IDX, BIL_LIN3_SHL_RE1_IDX, BIL_LIN3_SHL_RE2_IDX, BIL_LIN4_DWASENSOR_IDX, BIL_LIN4_SOUNDER_IDX, BIL_LIN6_VIP_HFS_IDX, BIL_LIN6_VIP_HBFS_IDX, BIL_LIN6_VIP_IDX }

detaileddescription.para: This array maps uint8 to TBilLinNodeIdx.
This function returns LIN node timeout state.
reentrant No context {task, Called by DK2 files to check for LIN timeout} thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

simplesect.title: Security Relevance
simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.
Boolean : node timeout state.

simplesect.para: NA

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified in following test: TEST_ErrIsLINSlaveInTimeout

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: This function is given by VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ECU_DIAG_Chorus.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.SW Requirements It satisfies the following Design Decision This is a helper function which returns the LIN Slave Timeout DTC active status.

detaileddescription.para: This function notifies error handler that message is received. It reset the global timeout counter for the appropriate bus. It reset the ECU timeout counter for the appropriate node.
reentrant No context {task, Called by BuiltInList when new mesage is received} thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

simplesect.title: Security Relevance
simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.

parameterdescription.para: TComChannel Channel - indicate channel in which message is received.
uint16 BillIndex - Index for given node.

simplesect.para: void.

simplesect.title: Globals
simplesect.para: NA

briefdescription.para: Error Handler - Gets information from other module.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
